venue.name: Tavern at the End of the World

item.description:
This Tuesday at 6:30, Cape Ann is hosting an event with three specialty beers, free appetizers, and free glassware at Tavern at the End of the World, which is right near Sullivan Station. It will be a great event to meet some fellow beer lovers and drink some harder to find local brews!

Please RSVP here via Eventbrite so the bar knows how many people to expect

TJ and Tom from Cape Ann will be there, and those guys are a ton of fun to hang out with, as I'm sure some of you remember from our last Cape Ann meetup!

They're bringing their 7.6% ABV Fisherman's Belgian Golden, and the 7% Sunrise Saison on draft - brewed with 150lbs of rhubarb and 250lbs of whole strawberries, and the Pilot Pils, a traditional Czech beer that was brewed in a small batch for the brewpub. Careful with that Belgian Golden...I still don't remember much from the end of our last Cape Ann meetup when they had that beer...

I'm looking forward to seeing you all there!

Don't forget to RSVP on Eventbrite! http://capeanneuro.eventbrite.com/

P.S. There's plenty of parking nearby, and it's a 5 minute walk from the T.
item.name: Drink Specialty Cape Ann Beers & Eat Free Appetizers This Tuesday
